snippet: Mr. LaHood, the son of former Transportation Secretary Ray LaHood, easily captured Thursday’s special election to replace the disgraced former Representative Aaron Schock.
abstract: Republican Illinois State Sen Darin LaHood wins special election to replace former United States Rep Aaron Schock, who had resigned from his House seat over spending scandal.
lead_paragraph: Mr. LaHood, the son of former Transportation Secretary Ray LaHood, easily captured Thursday’s special election to replace the disgraced former Representative Aaron Schock.

headline.main: Illinois: Republican Darin LaHood Wins U.S. House Race
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Republican Wins U.S. House Race
